name: code--challenge--week1
description: To create a student grades generator. To build a speed detector. To create a net salary calculator. ### INSTRUCTIONS #### STEP1; Open the terminal. Navigate all through to the desired location using cd~ Create the folder using mkdir week1-code Verify the folder name using ls #### DESCRIPTION This repository contains phase-1,week-1 code challenges.You are required to write down solutions using javascript thus practicing javascript.Afterwards you create separate javascript files for each of the named challenges above.
